description: This fruit packed crumble has a light and deliciously crisp oat and nut topping.
name: Blackberry, Apple & Oat Crumble Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g apples, sweet, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced and lightly grease a baking dish with a dash of coconut oil.
Place the apples, blackberries, orange zest, half of the maple syrup, cornflour and half of the cinnamon in a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture into the baking dish.
Mix the oats, walnuts and remaining cinnamon in a small bowl. Pour over the coconut oil and remaining maple syrup and mix well.
Top the fruit mixture with the crumble topping and spread out in an even layer. Bake for 50-60 minutes, until golden and bubbling. Set aside to cool for 20 minutes before serving.
